name: 棋物语 Stick Go story
description:
Stick Go story (棋物语) is a single-player indie game.
It attempts to link strategy board games with fighting RPG games, hoping to create a unique and interesting game experience.
Like most fighting games, you can control your character to fight with opponents by boxing, leg hitting, etc.
However, the core of the game is more like board games. The stickman-like characters can be regarded as 11 Go pieces. Each time you move a piece, the characters will respond.
Besides, the turn-based game consists of a series of levels, and needs some strategy to clear all of them. When trying to clear the game, you can also enjoy collecting achievements, watching fighting videos and exploring some stories ~
Wish you have a good time:D
